name: Boost Original
notes:
This is the original notice for Boost prior to the publication of the
boost-1.0 license in 2003. Several boost files still carry this license adn
could not be updated to the boost-1.0 license. This license is aslo found
in the AntiGrain Geometry component version 2.4. 
For an example of use in historical Boost, see 
https://github.com/boostorg/rational/blob/0fe0beca5397c812c4f85a7de0d0769de59e12e0/include/boost/rational.hpp
For an example of use in the current Boost, see 
https://github.com/boostorg/rational/blob/develop/include/boost/rational.hpp
text:
Permission to copy, use, modify, sell and distribute this software is granted
provided this copyright notice appears in all copies. This software is provided "as
is" without express or implied warranty, and with no claim as to its suitability for
any purpose.
